comment_text: I upgraded from an iPhone 12 in December. The update was very solid, and I'm more than happy with the improvements. However, it's not worth it if you're upgrading from a 14 or 15 to the 16. Overall, I've noticed significant improvements, including all-day battery life, faster speeds, amazing camera quality, a snappier and brighter display, and a more luxurious feel. I would rate this update a solid 10/10.

comment_text: Great to have an honest review. Thank you. The battery heating up is definitely an issue and renders the phone virtually unuseable. I've also had problems with apps not opening, swiping to answer a call not working etc. The jury is out for me on the cameras. I'm still learning how to use the various functions but I'm experiencing problems (could be user error). The biggest issue I have is battery life. I take a lot of photos and the phone barely lasts half a day unless I switch off everything, such as locations services, background app refresh etc.
